body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Wood Hotels customer service. My name is Matthew Wood. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's a pleasure to assist you, Martha. Can you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is seven eight zero three four one two zero five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Martha. Could you also provide your email address so we can follow up with you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is martha.hill@fakemail.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Martha. I will make sure to look into the issue you are facing. We appreciate your patience.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Matthew. I'm relieved that the problem will be addressed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Martha. We value your feedback and your satisfaction is our priority. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out to us, Martha. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us anytime. Have a wonderful day.
